alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; Central Mountains; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 12:04PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Emery and south central Carbon Counties through 1230 PM MDT... At 1203 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Huntington, or 17 miles south of Price, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Wellington, Sunnyside, East Carbon, Cleveland and Elmo. This includes the following highways... US Route 6 between mile markers 244 and 270. Utah Route 10 between mile markers 48 and 64. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; Central Mountains; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
